alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Portage; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:41AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Portage, southeastern Lincoln, Marathon, southwestern Langlade and western Shawano Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Rib Mountain to near Mosinee to 7 miles west of Stevens Point. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mosinee around 345 AM CDT. Wausau, Weston and Rib Mountain around 355 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Merrill, Council Grounds State Park, Bevent, Dutch Corners, Antigo and Wittenberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
